name: HOLO-2
description:
All for one, one for all!

The human species aboard the Mothership sent you, HOLO-2, down to colonize a possibly habitable planet.

They've been living for the Mothership for over a decade and it's starting to get bad, they're running low on oxygen.

Not only will you be responsible for creating YOUR people a sustainable home, you'll also have to sustain THEM in the meantime. 

The problem is, they both need oxygen. If one dies, though, so does the other... Hurry. There's not much time left.

------------------------

Basic Controls:

• WASD - Move

• Left and Right Arrows - Switch Seed

• Q - Place Dirt

• E - Plant Seeds

• Spacebar - Transfer oxygen to the Capsule (when you're close to it) for the Mothership

• C - Toggle Zoom
